text: EXCLUSIVE: Paris Hilton Gushes About 'Amazing' New Boyfriend Chris Zylka: He's 'My Best Friend' by Jennifer Drysdale 1:40 PM   EXCLUSIVE: Paris Hilton Gushes About 'Amazing' New Boyfriend Chris Zylka: He's 'My Best Friend' Paris Hilton has a new man in her life! The 36-year-old heiress took to Instagram over the weekend to reveal that she's dating The Leftovers actor Chris Zylka -- alongside a few adorable snaps. A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 1:34pm PST RELATED: Paris Hilton, Scarlett Johansson, Heidi Klum and More Stun at amfAR Gala in New York City -- See Their Glam Looks! While Hilton has kept   Zylka, 31, quiet until now, the former Simple Life star gushed about her then-unnamed new man to ET just two weeks ago. "Yes [there is a special man in my life], but it's a surprise," she teased at the amfAR gala in New York City. "You'll find out soon, probably." "He's amazing, beautiful, sweet, loyal. [He's] my best friend," she added. A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 5:04pm PST RELATED: Paris Hilton Says She's Not a Reality Star, Is Flattered Kendall Jenner Copied Her 21st Birthday Look Hilton also opened up about her just-released 21st fragrance, Gold Rush for Men, and hinted that Zylka might have been rocking the scent for Valentine's Day. "I love in a man when you just walk by and smell the cologne. It's something that just really has that sexy scent, and that's what I do when I make all my fragrances," she said. "Gold Rush for me has just like thisâ€¦ when you smell it, you just wanna kiss the guy. It's really hot." "It's pretty nice [to custom-make how my boyfriend smells]," she continued. "I think definitely Gold Rush is a great Valentine's Day gift for any boyfriend." A post shared by Paris Hilton (@parishilton) on Feb 19, 2017 at 8:07pm PST
